Data describing the state of the pong game.

Fields

  • ballLoc :: (Float, Float)

    Pong ball (x, y) location.

  • ballVel :: (Float, Float)

    Pong ball (x, y) velocity.

  • player1 :: Float

    Left player paddle height. Zero is the middle of the screen

    Right player paddle height.
